alert.note: Alert for Conway; Johnson; Logan; Pope; Yell (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued April 11 at 7:38PM CDT until April 11 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM CDT FOR EAST CENTRAL LOGAN...SOUTHEASTERN JOHNSON...SOUTHWESTERN CONWAY... NORTHEASTERN YELL AND SOUTHERN POPE COUNTIES... At 738 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Lake Dardanelle State Park, or near Russellville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. Locations impacted include... Russellville... Dardanelle... Atkins... Pottsville... London... Lake Dardanelle State Park... Lake Dardanelle... Galla Creek WMA... Mt Nebo State Park... Mosley... Taral... Holla Bend... Delaware... Gum Log... Moreland... Oak Grove in Pope County... This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 70 and 95. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
